amendment.description: Amendment directs the Secretary of Energy and the Secretary of Commerce, in consultation with other relevant agencies and stakeholders, to conduct a study on the feasibility of establishing an ethane storage and distribution hub in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. McKinley.
